title: Yellen Urges Congress to Raise Debt Limit Beyond 2024 Election
description: Republicans might try to use the borrowing cap as leverage if they achieve a majority in the House or Senate, but the Treasury secretary cautioned against a “devastating economic self-inflicted blow.”
dc:creator: Alan Rappeport
media:credit: T.J. Kirkpatrick for The New York Times
media:description: If Republicans take one or both chambers of Congress, they are likely to use the debt limit as leverage to achieve their legislative goals.
